Values.value: Input username is either null or empty
Input username is either null or empty

SEQUENCE.NAME: %refresh_token% == $null || %refresh_token% ==''
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: -- if refresh token is not present in cache --

Values.value: Refresh Token is not present in the Cache for the user %username%
Refresh Token is not present in the Cache for the user %username%. Please generate refresh and access tokens and insert into CacheManager MSAzureOAuth.

BRANCH.COMMENT: -- branch on status from http reply --
